sentences.en: AARP chose New York Life as the exclusive underwriter of its new life insurance program.
sentences.cn: 全美退休者协会(AARP) 选择纽约人寿作为新寿险计画的独家保险商.

sentences.en: General requirement of Underwriter Laboratories Inc.
sentences.cn: dUL对安规器件的通用要求.

sentences.en: Global 2000 became an underwriter for small farmers.
sentences.cn: “全球2000”成为了小农场主的承保公司。

sentences.en: Haitong Securities Co. will be the underwriter of the deal, It'said.
sentences.cn: 该公司表示, 海通证券将担任本次发行的主承销商.

sentences.en: He worked alongside bankers from Merrill Lynch , the lead underwriter, who invited him to join them.
sentences.cn: 他与主承销商美林的银行家共同工作, 并接到了美林的工作邀请.

sentences.en: If the market will not buy the shares, the underwriter buys them.
sentences.cn: 如果市场不买这些股票，包销商就会买。

sentences.en: If the underwriter did not put forward, enquire, policy - holder need not be informed.
sentences.cn: 假如保险人未提出询问的, 投保人无需告知.

sentences.en: If the Underwriting Agreement is terminated by the Underwriter, the Rights Issue also will not proceed.
sentences.cn: 如果包销商终止包销协议, 本公司也将停止供股.

sentences.en: Issued $ 10 face value 40 - year bonds to an underwriter at a price of 98.
sentences.cn: 按98%的价格卖给证券包销商面值10美元,40年期的债券.

sentences.en: Merrill has been Wall Street leading underwriter of CDOs since 2004.
sentences.cn: 自2004年以来,美林一直是华尔街最主要的CDO承销商.

sentences.en: The right of subrogation is an important statutory right of underwriter in maritime insurance.
sentences.cn: 既然索赔要求是在保险责任范围内,保险商就应负责赔偿.

sentences.en: The underwriter or the shipper is about to tackle the problem of your claim.
sentences.cn: 保险商或托人即将着手解决你方索赔问题.

sentences.en: Usually we receive a handsome premium rebate from our underwriter at regular interval.
sentences.cn: 通常,我们可定期从保险商那里拿到一笔可观的保险费回扣.

sentences.en: What makes insurant, underwriter, a third party?
sentences.cn: 什么叫被保险人 、 保险人 、 第三者?

sentences.en: Will you give us a premium rebate just as other underwriter do?
sentences.cn: 您会像其他保险商那样付给我们保险费用回扣 吗 ?

sentences.en: You can claim for the damaged goods with the underwriter.
sentences.cn: 你可以就受损货物向保险商索赔.

words.tran_cn: 给...保险；承诺支付；签在...下
保险公司；保险业者；承诺支付者；担保人

trans.tran_cn: 保险业者，保险公司，保险商，承诺支付者，担保人
